casebody.data:
Gene POLK, petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES. No. 15-8894. Supreme Court of the United States May 16, 2016. Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and the petition for a writ of certiorari dismissed. See Rule 39.8. Justice KAGAN took no part in the consideration or decision of this motion and this petition.
